author: Susan Zanol
review: Superb! I have rented from Local Property Management for 4 1/2 years. Staff is highly competent and totally tenant centered without being the least bit intrusive. Rent is reasonable and so are increases. In fact, this year there was no

author: Rhonda Steel
review: This property management is phenomenal and responsive. The management office is easily accessible on site in the Fairhaven location, w/ protected parking and protected mail. The apartments are good quality comparatively.

author: Meghan Lopez
review: Local Property takes care of its tenants!! Every request for maintenance was responded to within days, and the manager Dawnah is easy to reach and communicate with; she will always respond to your emails within a day. Our experience renting from Local Property was smooth and everything else we could have hoped for.

author: Jessica Danielle
review: Dawnah and James are a joy to work with, very responsive, kind and understanding! Probably the best rental company Ive ever worked with in Bellingham (out of a lot), definitely would love to continue renting from them in the future

author: Sandra Lewis
review: Good experience.  My son rented for two years.  They try their best to be good managers!  Manager gets busy at times, but always got back with us...but not many issues.  Would recommend!

author: Silas Uhder
review: Hands down the best property management company in Bellingham. They are responsive, professional and won't rip you off like some of the other companies in Bellingham.

author: Sandor Voros
review: A great place to rent from! They respond quickly to emails and maintenance requests and do not try to shell money out of you.

author: John Corbin
review: From beginning to end, there has been great communication and the unit we rented was very nice and high quality! Would recommend!

author: Ashley V
review: My favorite place to rent from so far! Very clean, nice and responsive management too!

ownerResponse.text:
Aw, thanks Ashley! We are sad to see you go, and we wish you all the best.

-James & Dawnah

author: Brian Gass
review: Great company. They are responsive to issues and address them promptly.  Always professional when interacting with them.
